Headline: #6 Jackson Park Express Temporary Reroute near Randolph/ Stetson
ShortDescription: 6 Jackson Park Express buses rerouted Southbound buses will operate via Wacker & State. Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus & Wacker

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#6 Jackson Park Express buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions near Randolph/ Stetson, due to street blockage.

Southbound buses will operate via Wacker and State

Northbound buses will operate via Michigan, Randolph, Columbus and Wacker

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #47 47th Temporary Reroute near 47th/Princeton
ShortDescription: 47 47th buses temp. rerouted Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Shields, Swan, Wentworth. Westbound buses will operate via 47th, Wells, 51st, Halsted.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#47 47th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions, due to street blockage near 47th/Princeton.

Eastbound buses will operate via 47th, Shields, Swan, Wentworth and 47th then resume their normal route on 47th.

Westbound buses will operate via 47th, Wells, 51st, Halsted and 47th then resume their normal route on 7th.

Allow extra travel time.
